author: Al Jazeera
title: World reacts to Trump withdrawing WHO funding
description: Critics call US president's move 'a dangerous step in the wrong direction' after he cuts 15 percent of UN agency budget.
content:
US President Donald Trump has instructed his administration to temporarily halt funding to the World Health Organization (WHO) over its handling of the coronavirus pandemic.
Trump said the WHO "failed in its basic duty and it must be held accountable". He sa… [+3858 chars]
